testandroll.pkg 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Test and Roll Package Vignette

    Function reference

    All functions

    error_rate_nn()
    Computes the rate of incorrect deployments with symmetric normal priors Where response is normal with symmetric normal priors
    months.means
    Sample data means
    months.sd
    Sample data standard deviations
    one_rep_profit()
    Utility function used in function 'profit_nn_sim()' to simulate one set of potential outcomes Draws a true mean for each arm and generates N observations from each arm Returns profits and error rates under perfect information, test & roll, and Thomson sampling
    one_rep_test_size()
    Utility function used in test_size_nn_sim() to simulate one set of potential outcomes Returns profits for all possible equal sample sizes
    plot_prior_effect_nn()
    Plots prior densities against treatment effect (difference in profit per customer)
    plot_prior_mean_resp_nn()
    Plots prior densities against mean response (profit per customer)
    plot_prior_resp_nn()
    Plots prior densities against response (profit per customer)
    profit_nn()
    Computes the per-customer profit for test & roll with 2 arms
    profit_nn_sim()
    Computes the per-customer profit for test & roll with K arms
    profit_perfect_nn()
    Computes per-customer profit with perfect information Where response is normal with symmetric normal priors
    test_eval_nn()
    Provides summary of a test & roll plan
    test_size_nht()
    Computes the recommended sample sizes for a null hypothesis test
    test_size_nn()
    Computes the profit-maximizing test size for test & roll with 2 arms (asymmetric case not yet implemented)
    test_size_nn_sim()
    Computes the profit-maximizing test size and profits for a multi-armed test & roll

    Developed by Ron Berman.
